items.content_html: A simple, yet powerful, calculator built with pure JavaScript. It supports basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) following the standard order of operations (PEMDAS/BODMAS). Ideal for those learning JavaScript or anyone in need of a lightweight, easy-to-use calculator.
items.title: mrdevcreator/basic-arithmetic-calculator: A simple, yet powerful, calculator built with pure JavaScript. It supports basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division) following the standard order of operations (PEMDAS/BODMAS). Ideal for those learning JavaScript or anyone in need of a lightweight, easy-to-use calculator.
